entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
